sourcesContent:
Email Template {{ emailTemplate.id }}

{{ emailTemplate.emailTemplateName }}
{{ emailTemplate.fromEmail }}
{{ emailTemplate.fromName }}
{{ emailTemplate.emailSubject }}
{{ emailTemplate.createdBy }}
{{ emailTemplate.createdDate | formatMediumDatetime }}
{{ emailTemplate.updatedBy }}
{{ emailTemplate.updatedDate | formatMediumDatetime }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IEmailTemplate } from './email-template.model'; @Component({ selector: 'ic-email-template-detail', templateUrl: './email-template-detail.component.html', }) export class EmailTemplateDetailComponent implements OnInit { emailTemplate?: IEmailTemplate; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ emailTemplate }) => { this.emailTemplate = emailTemplate; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
